channel.title: ~Release~ EXTREMENOOBscape
channel.description:
Ok so i got bored last night and decided to do this, wasn't going to release but might interest some people.
What is it?
-Its noobscape v2 with a twist - i decided to merge it with extreme-pk as it seemed an ok server.
Credits go to
* xEnt * Adam (Adu) * Kaur (Kakur007) * Yong Min
Changes:
Added a referee in Edge for the tourny. [URL=http://img11.imageshack.us/i/screenshot3wj.png/][IMG]http://img11.imageshack.us/img11/5456/screenshot3wj.th.png[/img][/URL]
Added Gypsy for Gambling in Edge [URL=http://img194.imageshack.us/i/screenshot4t.png/][IMG]http://img194.imageshack.us/img194/9703/screenshot4t.th.png[/img][/URL]
I Have added the free food area but it can cause lag when 5+ use at same time.... [URL=http://img30.imageshack.us/i/screenshot2if.png/][IMG]http://img30.imageshack.us/img30/8939/screenshot2if.th.png[/img][/URL]
Edited shark certs to give 5 sharks when clicked without the use of a certer - also put them in shops - brings something new to pking. [URL=http://img194.imageshack.us/i/screenshot7ir.png/][IMG]http://img194.imageshack.us/img194/5870/screenshot7ir.th.png[/img][/URL]
Added the Quickbank at Edge via use of the Dolmen - click it and it opens your bank. [URL=http://img34.imageshack.us/i/screenshot0fp.png/][IMG]http://img34.imageshack.us/img34/3943/screenshot0fp.th.png[/img][/URL]
Cave in Edge teleports. [URL=http://img34.imageshack.us/i/screenshot8r.png/][IMG]http://img34.imageshack.us/img34/8329/screenshot8r.th.png[/img][/URL]
Changed max lvl to 125 so now max combat is 156. [URL=http://img43.imageshack.us/i/screenshot1jj.png/][IMG]http://img43.imageshack.us/img43/502/screenshot1jj.th.png[/img][/URL]
Added :setstats command for Admins only.
As you can see i have not "coded" anything other than the new stats formula so therefor take NO credits for any other development of the server I just combined the two and released it.
http://www.filefactory.com/file/a06656e/n/EXTREMENOOBscape_v2_zip
Hope it helps :D

item.title: ~Release~ EXTREMENOOBscape
item.dc:creator: @bengina bengina
item.description:
@bengina wrote:

Ok so i got bored last night and decided to do this, wasn’t going to release but might interest some people.

What is it?

-Its noobscape v2 with a twist - i decided to merge it with extreme-pk as it seemed an ok server.

Credits go to

  • xEnt
  • Adam (Adu)
  • Kaur (Kakur007)
  • Yong Min

Changes:

Added a referee in Edge for the tourny.

Added Gypsy for Gambling in Edge

I Have added the free food area but it can cause lag when 5+ use at same time…

Edited shark certs to give 5 sharks when clicked without the use of a certer

  • also put them in shops - brings something new to pking.

Added the Quickbank at Edge via use of the Dolmen - click it and it opens your bank.

Cave in Edge teleports.

Changed max lvl to 125 so now max combat is 156.

Added :setstats command for Admins only.

As you can see i have not “coded” anything other than the new stats formula so therefor take NO credits for any other development of the server
I just combined the two and released it.

http://www.filefactory.com/file/a06656e/n/EXTREMENOOBscape_v2_zip

Hope it helps

Read full topic
